>
[Cryolite Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1650)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Contract" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=329" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 164</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You tore your eye from the socket and offered it to whatever spirit would take it. In return, you received a glass eye in its place. This eye allows you to see as normal, and when you succeed at a Perception check against an [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), you get a critical success instead. Once per day, from any distance, the entity that holds your bargained contract can overwhelm your _cryolite eye_ with magical energy, causing images to float over your vision that inflict the [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) condition on you for 1 minute.
